articles.author: Patrick Daly
articles.title: Christmas lockdown should be avoided as winter Covid wave unlikely, says expert - Evening Standard
articles.description: Professor Neil Ferguson’s comments come amid rising cases in Europe, with restrictions reimposed in some countries to control a new surge.
articles.content:
The expert whose modelling helped instigate the first coronavirus lockdown said he does not think restrictions will be needed this Christmas.
Professor Neil Ferguson a member of the Scientific Advis… [+4368 chars]

articles.title: Austrian brothel offering free entry, private sessions for those who get vaccinated on-site - Fox News
articles.description: A brothel in Austria is offering incentives for unvaccinated residents in the European country, granting free entry and private sessions for those who get the jab.
articles.content:

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Fresh Dutch Covid lockdown as 10 EU states at 'high concern' - New Straits Times
articles.description: THE HAGUE: European governments on Friday eyed unpopular Covid curbs, with the Netherlands opting for Western Europe's first partial lockdown of the winter as EU experts said 10 countries in the bloc were causing "very high concern".
